name: com.unity-intelligence
description:
Unity Intelligence is a powerful embedded AI assistant for the Unity Editor, providing seamless integration with Anthropic (Claude), OpenAI (GPTs), and Google (Gemini).

## Multi-Provider AI Integration

• **Anthropic (Claude)** - Advanced reasoning and code generation
• **OpenAI (GPTs)** - Industry standard with vision and streaming
• **Google (Gemini)** - Large context window support

All providers support streaming responses, function calling (tool use), and vision capabilities.

## 150+ AI-Callable Tools

### Script & Shader Tools
• create_script, modify_script, read_script, edit_script - Full C# script management
• insert_in_script, append_to_script, delete_script_lines - Granular code editing
• analyze_script - Parse classes, methods, and structure
• create_script_from_template - MonoBehaviour, ScriptableObject, Editor, EditorWindow templates
• create_shader, modify_shader, create_shader_from_template - ShaderLab and HLSL
• create_compute_shader - GPU compute shaders
• Shader templates: Unlit, Surface, URP Lit, URP Unlit, Image Effect, Vertex/Fragment

### Scene Management
• get_current_scene, get_scene_hierarchy - Scene inspection
• create_scene, save_scene, load_scene - Scene lifecycle
• find_gameobjects - Search by name, tag, or component
• get_scene_lighting, set_scene_lighting - Lighting configuration

### Asset Management
• search_assets, get_asset_info - Asset discovery
• create_folder, move_asset, copy_asset, delete_asset - Asset operations
• get_asset_dependencies, find_references - Dependency tracking
• create_scriptable_object - Runtime data assets
• import_asset, set_asset_labels - Asset pipeline

### Prefab Tools
• create_prefab, instantiate_prefab - Prefab creation
• get_prefab_info, list_prefabs - Prefab inspection
• apply_prefab_overrides, revert_prefab_overrides - Override management
• unpack_prefab, update_prefab - Prefab modification

### Material & Shader Tools
• create_material, get_material_properties - Material creation
• set_material_color, set_material_float, set_material_texture - Property editing
• assign_material, get_renderer_materials - Renderer integration
• list_shaders, get_shader_info, check_shader_errors - Shader utilities

### Transform & Hierarchy
• set_position, set_rotation, set_scale, set_transform - Transform manipulation
• get_transform, set_parent, set_sibling_index - Hierarchy control
• duplicate_gameobject, delete_gameobject - Object management
• set_active, set_layer, set_tag, look_at - GameObject properties

### Component Tools
• get_component, get_all_components, add_component - Component management
• remove_component, set_component_property, set_component_enabled - Component editing
• copy_component, reset_component - Component utilities
• find_components_of_type, list_component_types - Component discovery

### Physics Tools
• add_rigidbody, configure_rigidbody, get_rigidbody_info - Rigidbody setup
• add_collider, configure_box_collider, configure_sphere_collider - Collider configuration
• raycast, raycast_all, overlap_sphere, overlap_box - Physics queries
• get_physics_settings, set_gravity - Physics configuration
• get_layer_collision_matrix, set_layer_collision - Layer physics
• add_joint - Physics joints

### UI Tools
• create_canvas, configure_canvas_scaler - Canvas setup
• create_ui_element - Text, Image, Button, Toggle, Slider, InputField, Dropdown, ScrollView, Panel
• set_rect_transform, set_text_properties, set_image_properties - UI styling
• set_button_properties, get_ui_hierarchy, find_ui_elements - UI management
• add_layout_group, add_content_size_fitter - Layout components

### Animation Tools
• add_animator, get_animator_info, set_animator_parameter - Animator control
• create_animator_controller, add_animator_parameter - Controller creation
• add_animator_state, add_animator_transition, add_transition_condition - State machine
• add_animator_layer - Layer management
• create_animation_clip, get_animation_clip_info - Clip creation
• add_animation_curve, add_animation_event - Keyframe animation
• set_animation_clip_settings - Loop, mirror, cycle offset

### Console & Diagnostics
• get_console_logs, get_console_errors, get_console_warnings - Read console entries
• get_compile_errors - Get compilation errors with file paths and line numbers
• get_last_exception - Get most recent error with stack trace
• get_compilation_status - Check if scripts are compiling
• clear_console - Clear all console entries

### Editor Utilities
• get_selection, set_selection, clear_selection, select_all_of_type - Selection management
• undo, redo - History control
• get_play_mode_state, enter_play_mode, exit_play_mode, pause_play_mode - Play mode
• log_message - Console output
• execute_menu_item, list_menu_items - Menu system
• get_project_info, get_project_settings, get_build_settings - Project inspection
• refresh_assets, compile_scripts - Asset pipeline

## Architecture

• SSE streaming for real-time responses in Unity Editor
• Main-thread execution guarantee for all Unity API calls
• Attribute-based tool discovery ([AITool] and [AIToolParameter])
• Undo support for all destructive operations
• Confirmation dialogs for dangerous actions
• Secure API key storage with EditorPrefs obfuscation

## Requirements

• Unity 2021.3 or later
• .NET Standard 2.1 / .NET Framework 4.x
• API keys for desired providers (Claude, OpenAI, and/or Gemini)
